author: bencos18
install_msg: Thank you for installing the AutoChannel cog. Use `[p]autochannel` to manage auto-reply channels. For support, message me on Discord (bencos18) or open a GitHub issue.
description: Cog to automatically reply in specified channels. Lets you set channels where the bot will always reply to messages.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores channel IDs for the purpose of tracking which channels are set for auto-reply. All data is stored using Red's Config system and is not shared with third parties.
